title: 回应催进度
situation: A client is asking when you can deliver. You need to give a realistic timeline.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 客户问什么时候能交付。
turns.pinyin: Kèhù wèn shénme shíhou néng jiāofù.
turns.translation: The client is asking when we can deliver.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 按照现在的排期，月底可以给第一个版本。
turns.pinyin: Ànzhào xiànzài de páiqī, yuèdǐ kěyǐ gěi dì yī ge bǎnběn.
turns.translation: Based on the current schedule, we can deliver the first version by end of month.
suggestions: 按照现在的排期，月底可以给第一个版本。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 能提前吗？他们比较着急。
turns.pinyin: Néng tíqián ma? Tāmen bǐjiào zháojí.
turns.translation: Can we deliver earlier? They're in a hurry.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 提前的话得砍功能，我列个清单给你们选。
turns.pinyin: Tíqián de huà děi kǎn gōngnéng, wǒ liè ge qīngdān gěi nǐmen xuǎn.
turns.translation: To deliver earlier we'd have to cut scope. I'll list options for you to choose.
suggestions: 提前的话得砍功能，我列个清单给你们选。
要提前只能减需求，我整理一下备选。
